column4: Are there any drawbacks to using the 64-bit version of Ubuntu as opposed to the 32-bit version?
There's no 64bit flash player.  That's about it.
cant you use the 32-bit version on the 64-bit system? I thought tehre was backwards compatibility
Yes, you can use the 32bit flashplayer, but you'll need a 32bit firefox, etc.  Basically, it's a bit more hassle.
